comments:
If I try to collect data from a perspective other than the profile and logging perspective, I get a prompt asking me to swtich perspectives.  If I click no - so that perspectives aren't switched, the following exception is generated.

I need to be able to programmatically launch, attach, collect, and detach from agents without changing perspectives to keep a consistent user experience using the TPTP as a platform only - and not its specific UI constructs.
